name: bricks-activity-log-grafana-plugin
description: BRICKS Activity Log integration and data source

scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(changelog): update CHANGELOG' && yarn version --major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(changelog): update CHANGELOG' && yarn version --minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(changelog): update CHANGELOG' && yarn version --patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
